LanguageData.OG_Imperial_Arco_Flagellant.title: Arco Flagellant
LanguageData.OG_Imperial_Arco_Flagellant.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] committed a serious crime against the Empire and either chose or was forced to become a Flagellant to atone for his/her crime. Now he/she is nothing more than a killing machine.
